attributes.action: Google and all search engines to ban all indecent images of children on internet
attributes.additional_details:
I call upon the government to make it illegal for all search engines to allow pictures and videos of an indecent nature towards children to be found or posted on the internet.

Too many times now children have been abused, attacked and worse due to a vile few who start off with internet fuelled obsessions which lead to much more horrible crimes down the line. It is time we put a stop to it.
